title: Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring the story of Abraham Lincoln to your classroom.  Lesson plans will supplement classroom instruction for both field trip bound students and students learning the story of Abraham Lincoln's boyhood in Indiana.   All Curriculum Materials   Curriculum Materials    Teachers Packet Learn More     Traveling Trunks Put on Lincoln's hat and you take your students on a journey of Abraham Lincoln's life before he became our 16th president.  The Lincoln Traveling Trunk provides an interactive learning experience for students who are studying Abraham Lincoln.  Find out more about borrowing the Lincoln Traveling Trunk today. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunk    Traveling Trunks Learn More     Field Trips Bring your class to Lincoln Boyhood!  Plan a Ranger-led field trip, visit the farm, hike a trail through the woods, and visit the gravesite of Nancy Hanks Lincoln.   All Field Trips   Field Trips    Ranger-led programs Learn More
